thread.title: ‘Take a Massive Gigantic Chill Pill’ Over Trump: Piers Morgan Battles Maher as Panel Goes Off the Rails
thread.title_full: ‘Take a Massive Gigantic Chill Pill’ Over Trump: Piers Morgan Battles Maher as Panel Goes Off the Rails

author: Justin Baragona
title: ‘Take a Massive Gigantic Chill Pill’ Over Trump: Piers Morgan Battles Maher as Panel Goes Off the Rails
text:
9th Circuit Judge Wants Another Vote on Trump Travel Ban Decision Video ‘Take a Massive Gigantic Chill Pill’ Over Trump: Piers Morgan Battles Maher as Panel Goes Off the Rails by Justin Baragona | 11:01   
During the panel discussion on Real Time with Bill Maher tonight, journalist Piers Morgan took umbrage with Bill Maher and others describing President Donald Trump as “mentally ill” and an “idiot.” 
After Maher wrapped up on interview with Sen. Al Franken (D-MN), in which the lawmaker called Trump mentally ill, Maher began the panel discussion and Morgan immediately went after the comedian. 
Following a rant about how everyone is over the top with their criticisms and characterizations of Trump, especially when it comes to calling him the “new Hitler,” Morgan then made a request from everybody against Trump. 
“I just think it is time for everybody to take a massive gigantic chill pill,” the former CNN host exclaimed. 
Over the next few minutes, Morgan would offer defenses of Trump while the rest of the panel and Maher would shoot them down. 
Morgan insisted that they needed to save the outrage for when Trump actually goes over the edge. Meanwhile, Maher kept noting that this “isn’t normal.” 
Watch the entire exchange above, via HBO. 
[image via screengrab]
